components.name: Identity, Security & Operations || Key Management Service

incident_updates.body: We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Web Hosting offer on the specific Cluster121/filerz990. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 02/02/2026 10:20 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Logs have a malfunction Customers Impact : Customers cannot acces their logs, otherwise their hosted websites are operational. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We are currently experiencing an event affecting our Web Hosting offer on the Cluster121/filerz990. Start time : 02/02/2026 10:20 UTC Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our .TL Domains offer, customers in the impacted zone are unable to perform some tasks on .TL domains. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 02/02/2026 09:35 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Multiple operations (Registration, Renew, Transfer, Restore, Delete) are temporarily unavailable for .TL domains. Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to perform specified operations on .TL domains. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilized to restore service as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

Please find below an update on the situation: Ongoing Actions : Actions are currently being carried out by our technical teams to ensure a permanent resolution of the issue. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s). Please find below an update on the situation: Update : The filerz is still stable since 14/01/2026 15:30 UTC. Ongoing Actions : Actions are still in progress by our technical teams to permanently correct the issue. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Service has been fully restored since 14/01/2026 15:30 UTC. Monitoring remains active to ensure long-term stability. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 09/01/2026 09:50 UTC Impacted Service(s) : File server 2186 experienced latency on Web Hosting Cluster 100. Customers Impact : Customers using filer servers 2186 on Cluster100 were temporarily experiencing latency when accessing their hosted websites. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We are currently investigating an incident affecting our Web Hosting offering, which is causing temporary latency issue in the Filerz2186 - Cluster100. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 07/01/2026 10:30 UTC Impacted Service(s) : File server 2186 is experiencing latency on Web Hosting Cluster 100. Customers Impact : Customers using filer servers 2186 on Cluster100 are temporarily experiencing latency when accessing their hosted websites. Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Hosting offer. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time: 03/02/2026 09:00 UTC End time: 03/02/2026 11:00 UTC Service impact: Filerz990 will be temporarily unavailable for 30 minutes during the maintenance. Service improvement: As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are going to migrate the Filerz990 to keep it up to date and enhance the reliability of our infrastructure. Thank you for your understanding.

scheduled_maintenances.name: [EU][Web Cloud] - Outlook Web Access mailbox migration

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

affected_components.name: Collaborative solutions || MX Plan - Mailbox Access

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Cloud offer. Start time : 09/12/2025 18:00 UTC End time : 31/05/2026 09:44 UTC Service impact : Service interruption is expected for a few minutes to a few hours Affected customers will receive several emails notifying them of the maintenance day. During this period, emails received will be delivered after the short interruption. Service improvement : The purpose of this operation is to migrate MXPLAN mailboxes under Outlook Web Access (OWA) to the new Zimbra Webmail. No action is required from the customers. For further information, please find attached a link to the FAQ: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/fr-mx-plan-zimbra-faq?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0061410 Thank you for your understanding.

affected_components.name: Collaborative solutions || MX Plan - Mailbox Access
